participant_2.background:
I love reading about different cultures and their food, so my favorite food is always changing.
I am afraid that I will lose my ability to enjoy nature or technology.
I am prone to spending hours researching random topics online.
my best friend is gay.
i work as a dental assistant in a ritzy part of town.

content.text: I love to hear about different cultures.  What is your favorite food right now?
Right now, I'm really into Szechuan food.  But it changes all the time.  It's so much fun to try new things!
That sounds delicious!  I've always wanted to travel to China and try authentic Szechuan food.
You should do it!  It's amazing.  I went to college in Shanghai and I loved trying all the different foods there.
That sounds incredible!  I'm so jealous.
Why don't you come visit me in Shanghai sometime?
I would love to!  I'll have to plan a trip.
Great!  I'll start planning the menu.
So what do you like to do for fun?
I like to go for walks, listen to music, and organize my surroundings.
That sounds really relaxing.  I love going for walks too.
Me too!  It's a great way to clear your head.
What kind of music do you like to listen to?
I like a lot of different types of music, but I especially like Prince.
I love Prince!  He's so talented.
Me too!  He's one of my favorite artists.
I'm so glad we have something in common.
